bill.title: Animal cruelty crimes; revise laws regarding.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 97-41-1, 97-41-2, 97-41-3, 97-41-5, 97-41-7, 97-41-9, 97-41-13, 97-41-15, 97-41-16 And 97-41-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, And To Create New Section 97-41-8, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Laws Regarding Animal Cruelty Crimes; To Establish The Offense Of Cruelty To Animals And The Offense Of Aggravated Cruelty To A Dog Or Cat; To Revise The Process By Which An Animal May Be Lawfully Seized And Lawfully Disposed Of; To Provide Definitions Of Terms; To Provide Exemptions From The Application Of Laws Regarding Such Offenses; To Provide Immunity For Reporting Cruelty To Animals Or Aggravated Cruelty To A Dog Or Cat; To Provide For Seizure Of Animals In Possession Of Arrested Persons; To Provide For Exemption From The Application Of The Chapter If The Action Is The Result Of An Act Of God Or Natural Disaster; To Bring Forward Sections 11-46-9, 19-5-50, 21-19-9, 41-53-11 And 95-5-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For The Purpose Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
